    Function reference

    All functions

    check_rtxt()
    Function for checking robots.txt file
    classify_substance()
    Classify a specific WADA substance
    classify_wada_substances()
    Classify banned WADA substances
    create_regex_wb()
    Create a regular expression with word boundaries
    dtstamp()
    Insert date/time stamp
    export_extdata()
    Export data to inst/extdata/
    get_recent()
    Return the most recent modification date
    get_recent_path()
    Return current data in folder
    guess_basename()
    Guess filename for download from url
    `%nin%`
    Not in (not-in operator for R.)
    `%otherwise%`
    null-coalescing operator. See purrr for details.
    polite_download_file()
    Polite download
    polite_fetch_rtxt()
    Function to get robots.txt is structured form. Memoised
    polite_read_html()
    function that actually fetches response from the web
    process_text()
    Process raw data
    run_app()
    Run the Shiny Application
    str_extract_matches()
    Match string and extract the matched value
    str_parse_term()
    Parse string into individual terms (as tibble)
    theme_ggp2g()
    ggplot2 theme (doping data)

    Developed by Martin Frigaard.
